summary: PURCHASED VEHICLE FROM CAR LOT FEB. 28, 2015.  DROVE THIS VEHICLE 5 TIMES AND THE COOLANT LEAKED.  FLUSHED SYSTEM NOTICE THERE WAS STOP LEAK IN RADIATOR.  NOW MY TRANSMISSION SLIPS AND TRUCK SHAKES DURING ACCELERATION.  THIS WAS A PREVIOUS ISSUE BEFORE I BOUGHT THE VEHICLE BECAUSE THE SHAKING OCCURRED WHEN DRIVING HOME.  I THOUGHT THIS WAS JUST THE TIRES NEEDING TO BE BALANCED, BUT AFTER RESEARCH I KNOW THAT IT WAS FROM THE COOLANT PREVIOUSLY LEAKING INTO THE TRANSMISSION, AND NOW I AM LEFT TO DEAL WITH IT.  *TR
